entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
